posts.postText:
Offender name?: Evil Cocaine
Which Server?: JailBreak
Offender's Steam ID?: Steam_0:0:1903701
What the Offender did?: Mic spam after gag, and he did some threatening to me about telling me he had my IP, as in to "leave" him be. I couldnt get proof of him mic spamming after i gagged, but i asked lobby if he was mic spamming, i think thats proof enough? and isnt it hacking, for being gagged, but still being able to talk on your mic? (just wondering...)
Admins on?: None
Proof?: http://i54.tinypic.com/33xd8ht.png 
 http://i52.tinypic.com/24pm4k0.png
Oh and i know witnesses dont count, but i clearly gagged him, and he was still using his mic, so i suspect he was hacking.. i hope that this was enough proof though.... IF not. im sorry.

IP logging is already enough for me. That's a thing they have with sethhack. Yes, he was hacking. 
Banned.
